targets.query: SELECT last("ifInOctets_rate") * 8 /1000000 FROM "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-wan-agg-fcx.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" = 'ethernet1/1/1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("ifOutOctets_rate") * 8 /1000000 FROM "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-wan-agg-fcx.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" = 'ethernet1/1/1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.content:
